name: Click Attack!
description:
A simple LAN-Multiplayer clicker game. This game requires 2 people to connect to each other through LAN, meaning you need to be on the same Wifi. Click the money, then use the money to buy soldiers to attack your friends.

Use "I" to open up the info menu, and press it again to close it. Use "Escape" to close the application, and use "A" as a quick attack function.

Also, for those who are asking, because I know many will, yes, you can play cross-platform. Mac, and Windows can play together locally.
